entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chilliwack
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 12:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: SSE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches. Low zero. Forecast issued 12:25 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning in the morning except wet snow over higher terrain late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 12:25 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 12:25 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 12:25 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
